name: 菲利普·耶迪克
name_full: 菲利普·耶迪克 Philipp Jedicke
introduction: Born in Kehl, Germany in 1977, he has lived in Canada and France and is currently based in Cologne. He works as a freelance journalist and post-production manager for various television stations, film production companies, newspapers, magazines and websites. Focusing mainly on music and culture, his work has featured on TV channels including WDR, ARTE, Deutsche Welle, SWR as well as in the Süddeutsche Zeitung German newspaper. Shut Up and Play the Piano is his directing debut.
